articles.author: Jihye Lee, Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asia markets mostly rise as U.S. inflation forecasts fall, Nikkei to reach new 2023-highs - CNBC
articles.description: The U.S. Fed is widely expected to hold rates for the first time in 15 months while inflation's annual outlook marked a two-year low in the latest New York Fed survey.
articles.content:
Tailwinds from improvements in delivery could be restricted by increases in competition for electric vehicle maker Nio, according to Nomura.
